entities.name: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Executive Officer is responsible for the overall management and operation of the company, ensuring that it meets its strategic objectives and goals.

entities.name: CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Financial Officer is responsible for managing the financial actions of the company, including financial planning, management of financial risks, record-keeping, and financial reporting.

entities.name: PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP
entities.description: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is an independent registered public accounting firm that audited the effectiveness of the company's internal control over financial reporting as of January 30, 2022.

entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is the company discussed in the document, responsible for implementing and maintaining internal control over financial reporting.

relationships.relationship_description: The Chief Executive Officer is part of the management team responsible for the overall management and operation of NVIDIA.
The Chief Financial Officer is part of the management team responsible for managing the financial actions of NVIDIA.
PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP audited the effectiveness of NVIDIA's internal control over financial reporting as of January 30, 2022.
